doc.field: Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)

Lists of students by grade for each year. For most years, lists include student and parent names, addresses and telephone numbers (and sometimes professions). Many rosters list entire student body, but those divided into classes also include information such as teacher, assistant and class chairman names. Varying types of other information included for some years, such as lockers numbers, or a faculty directory. 1944-1959 onward, rosters include addresses (and sometimes professions) of parents.
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
